name: AWS App Mesh Virtual Gateway
short: A service within AWS App Mesh that allows resources outside your mesh to communicate to resources that are inside your mesh.
description: AWS App Mesh Virtual Gateway represents an access point to route ingress traffic for applications deployed on AWS. It facilitates the management of network traffic within and across microservices, offering observability, control, and security for service-to-service communication. Acting as a gateway, it receives and routes traffic to multiple virtual services based on custom routing rules. It's particularly beneficial in complex microservice architectures, ensuring smooth and secure application networking management.
